user.title: State updated helper
user.description: The state updated helper allows you to create a binary sensor which show if a state or a state attribute from another entity has changed. New and old values are availible until marked as not changed

data.name: Name. If empty, entity id name are used

data.attribute: Attribute of entity that this sensor tracks
data.text_template: Defines a template to create the text attribute. Values = new_value, old_value, entity_id, attribute and last_updated
data.default_text_template: Entity {{ entity_id }} state changed from {{ old_value }} from {{ new_value }}.
